effect.description: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokémon to the Active Spot.
If tails, this attack does nothing.
Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard 2 Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.
Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
If tails, this attack does nothing.
Flip 2 coins. Attach Fire Energy equal to the heads count from your discard pile.
Discard a Fire Energy from this Pokémon.
This attack does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.
If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra Water Energy, this attack does 60 more damage.
Your opponent can't use any Supporter cards during their next turn.
If this Pokémon is damaged by an attack from an opponent's Pokémon, deal 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.
This Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 more damage for each heads.
This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
If tails, this attack does nothing.
Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This attack does 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.
Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't attack.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 60 more damage.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.
This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may attach 2 Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.
This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Flip 4 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.
This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from their hand during their next turn.
As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can't play any Supporter cards from their hand.
Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks.
This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.
Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may take 1 Energy from your discard pile and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.
Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon during your opponent's next turn.
If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 more damage.
This Pokémon also does 50 damage to itself.
During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do 20 less damage.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 80 damage for each heads.
This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.
Heal from this Pokémon the same amount of damage you did to your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.
Search your deck for up to 2 Nidoran cards and put them onto your Bench.
This attack does 50 more damage for each Nidoran, Nidorina, and Nidoqueen on your Bench.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.
If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 70 more damage.
Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may make all of your opponent's Benched Pokémon Poisoned.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Take a Steel Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.
This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks.
Flip 4 coins. For each heads, this attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.
Once during your turn, you may switch your opponent's Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.
Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.
Draw a card.
Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.
Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.
Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack. If this Pokémon doesn’t have the necessary Energy to use that attack, this attack does nothing.
Once during your turn, you may look at the top card of your deck.
Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent shuffles their Active Pokémon into their deck.
This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.
Your opponent reveals their hand.
